::KitKat/GoldenEye::

KitKat::
She hugged Drillbit.  She couldn't talk, all she ould do was cry. 
Some leader, she thought.  What kind of Pred leader shoots her own 
troops and then cries over it, she was hating herself right now.

GoldenEye::
She looked up at Drillbit.  She looked down at Dollen. "I don't know 
if he can be moved or not.  He..he blocked me from being thrown from 
the pod.  He's injured, but I don't know how bad."  She looked at 
Dollen and brushed her hand over his cheek again.  She looked up at 
Drillbit,"please, if you have a CR, please, he needs one."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit saw everything, he ran up to KitKat, and huged her. He 
could
> only imagine what was going through her head right now.
> "Oh, god. You did the right thing. They would have tortured her. You
> saved her. What Deemos said, was just to anger you." He said, 
trying to
> comfort her.
> "I have to go to that pod. I'll be back." He said.
> He then went to the hatch, got out, and ran up to GoldenEye and 
Dollen.
> "What is the situation? Can he be moved?" He asked.
